Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Comfort Inn Edgware Road W2, you'll be centrally located in London, convenient to Lord's Cricket Ground and Selfridges. This family-friendly hotel is close to London Zoo and Royal Albert Hall.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 38 air-conditioned rooms featuring LCD televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and complimentary newspapers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities, which include wireless Internet access (surcharge) and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, express check-in, and a 24-hour front desk.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Make use of convenient amenities, which include wireless Internet access (surcharge) and tour/ticket assistance.
Make yourself at home in one of the 38 air-conditioned rooms featuring LCD televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and complimentary newspapers.

With a stay at Comfort Inn Edgware Road W2, you'll be centrally located in London, convenient to Lord's Cricket Ground and Selfridges. This family-friendly hotel is close to London Zoo and Royal Albert Hall.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Lord's Cricket Ground - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
London Business School - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Regent's Park - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Madame Tussaud's Wax Museum - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Whiteleys Shopping Centre - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Queen Mary's Gardens - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Marble Arch - 1.5 km / 1 mi
Hyde Park Speakers' Corner - 1.5 km / 1 mi
Portman Square - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Royal Academy of Music - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Wallace Collection - 1.7 km / 1 mi
Selfridges - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi
Park Square Garden - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
Kensington Gardens - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
London Zoo - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi

The nearest airports are:
London (LCY-London City) - 15.7 km / 9.7 mi
London (LHR-Heathrow) - 19.9 km / 12.4 mi

The preferred airport for Comfort Inn Edgware Road W2 is London (LHR-Heathrow).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
